EmailTemplate.subject: Important VMTurbo Security Announcement | Securing VMTurbo Operations Manager from Heartbleed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Important VMTurbo Security Announcement Securing VMTurbo Operations Manager From The OpenSSL "Heartbleed" (CVE-2014-0160) Vulnerability Dear {{lead.first name:default=Valued Customer}}, VMTurbo is aware of the OpenSSL "Heartbleed” vulnerability and have a fix ready for you to apply today. For your convenience please reference this KB article on VMTurbo’s Support Web Site which contains the information you need to apply the fix:
Securing VMTurbo Operations Manager from the OpenSSL "Heartbleed" (CVE-2014-0160) vulnerability <https://support.vmturbo.com/hc/en-us/articles/201986223> VMTurbo is committed to your success. If you have any questions please reach out to VMTurbo in any of the following ways:
Web: http://support.vmturbo.com <http://support.vmturbo.com>/ Email: support@vmturbo.com <mailto:support@vmturbo.com> Phone: +1 (844)-VMTURBO (+1 (844)-868-8726)
Thank you for your business! VMTurbo
READ NOW <http://bit.ly/1dUDu07>
